title: Dirty Glory: Go Where Your Best Prayers Take You
description: U. K. Book of the Year 2017!For many Christians, prayer is an obligation that has little bearing on everyday life. The story of the 24/7 prayer movement demonstrates in gripping detail how prayer is far more than an obligation and how God is far more interested in prayer than we are. Continuing to chronicle the life and extraordinary ministry of the 24/7 prayer movement for a readership anxiously awaiting this title, Pete Greig tells story after story of Godâ€™s faithful interaction with human prayer to change lives and cultures.
author: Pete Greig
